Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Poly-UP (Main Char. Field Models)
Mod.Author: Digixu + AxlRose + Megachocobo
Mod.Description: - Replace all Main_chr poly models with their hi-res versions. - 8x (1024x1024) Upscaled Textures by Magochocobo *used with permission

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes:
Version 2.1: - Mago's battle textures have been added - Put back high poly models + new textures (for Junction VIII v1.0.1.1+) - New option to select the low poly models + new textures
WARNING: There is a known issue on the Ragnarok Bridge. If you experience wrong rendering behaviors, please select the Low-Poly Mode in the mod config.
